channel.title: Some Questions
channel.description:
I am setting up Animations for each of my Barrow's weapons so that people aren't tempted to mass-click, and I am wondering how I make it so that an Animation starts, and ends... then in like 5 seconds start again. Is there? Any help appreciated, thanks.
Q #2.) Okay, second question, i've made something like this: [code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716)[/code] and I want to be able to make it so that if a player meets those requirements (wears full dharoks) their max hit goes up by 30 .... how can i do that?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 09:20:33 AM[/size][hr]new Question... [br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 10:22:02 AM[/size][hr]Will anybody please tell me how to do this????
Q #3.) Third question, is there a list of animations out there somewhere that lists and shows what all the animations do or how do I find them out?
Q #4.) Fourth Question, what do all the numbers in this mean (the first, second, and third)?[code]attackPlayersWithin(76, 4000, 100);[/code] [br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 10:47:37 AM[/size][hr]More questions added[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 11:02:17 AM[/size][hr]DAng u guys help other people but not me -cries-[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 11:26:38 AM[/size][hr]ANYONE?

item.title: Some Questions
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“idkman, post:2, topic:74439”]for Q#2. thats really impossible… soz but… u need to be more spusific. then ill help ya out[/quote]I don’t think it’s impossible, because I’ve seen specials do something like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Questions

item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

I am setting up Animations for each of my Barrow’s weapons so that people aren’t tempted to mass-click, and I am wondering how I make it so that an Animation starts, and ends… then in like 5 seconds start again. Is there? Any help appreciated, thanks.

Q #2.) Okay, second question, i’ve made something like this: if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4722 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4720 && playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4716) and I want to be able to make it so that if a player meets those requirements (wears full dharoks) their max hit goes up by 30 … how can i do that?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 09:20:33 AM[/size][hr]new Question… [br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 10:22:02 AM[/size][hr]Will anybody please tell me how to do this???

Q #3.) Third question, is there a list of animations out there somewhere that lists and shows what all the animations do or how do I find them out?

Q #4.) Fourth Question, what do all the numbers in this mean (the first, second, and third)?attackPlayersWithin(76, 4000, 100);
